oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We are active folks looking for more of the same kind of people. You need not be a delegate or state coordinator to chair or serve on any committee. Nation wide participation is invitee. Please contact these various chairpersons if you have questions, or would like to contribute.AVY AWARDS: Lee Horton,chair .............
